did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: This collection contains a letter written by D. A. Daugherty, written in 1861 regarding a cow used as payment for a debt.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from D. A. Daugherty Letter must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: D. A. Daugherty Letter, Ms2012-053, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The D. A. Daugherty Letter was purchased by Special Collections in 2010.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the D. A. Daugherty Letter was completed in September 2012.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a letter written by D.A. Daugherty as a complaint against the confiscation of his cow in payment for a debt. It was written in Jeffersonville, Virginia, March 1861.
